name: Small Giant Game
description:
Small Giant game, a horror puzzle game for 2 players in virtual reality. Where one player is a giant robot and the other is a small elf, together they must solve puzzles and escape.

This game requires 2 VR headsets and can be played online. Please note that the game lacks any kind of lobby system so you might accidentally join a strangers game.

This project was done in 48 hours as part of save the OGL gamejam with Unity using VRTK, Oculus integration, Photonpun2 and PlayoVR.

Game has been tested  with Oculus and might work with other Vr decives but probably not.
